message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $12,000. I think it would be a valuable addition to what you do, and this is a competitive price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is already a competitive price for this product. Could you meet me halfway at $10,000?

Thank you for considering my position, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am unable to meet at $10,000. I would like to propose $9,000 as a counteroffer. I believe this is a fair compromise given the current market value.
